title: Girls ' lives versus boys ' life magazine covers
subtitle: The comparison between a girls ' magazine and one for boys, together, seems to reveal a significant division in the way the media communicates, but there was more story.
author: Brooke Binkowski
vclaim: The September 2016 issue of "The Life of Boys" explores the future of work and personal development, but the same month of "The Life of Girls" presents articles on how to be beautiful, showing a disparity in the way the media treats boys and girls.
